cast.name: 麦迪哈·凯米尔 Madiha Kamel

introduction: Ramzi works in a hotel where he discovers a gang is staying in the hotel having a bag including a large amount of stolen money. He steals the bag and escapes to a far away challet, owned by Mansour, the old man married to Salma who is much younger than him. Salma is involved in an affair with Ramzi, and asks him to help her kill Mansour and start a new life with the money, but Ramzi refuses as he loves Mansour’s daughter Naglaa. Salma decides to burn the house to kill Mansour, but she couldn’t get out herself so she also dies. Ramzi and Naglaa gets married and a new life with the money he stole.
